meanings.definition: A spherical bacterium occurring in grape-like clusters.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the staphylococcus looked like tiny grapes.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the staphylococcus bacteria in the patient's blood sample.
meanings.sent3: The staphylococcus bacteria decided to form a grape club and have a party.
meanings.sent4: The staphylococcus bacteria spread through the body like a cluster of grapes.
meanings.sent5: The staphylococcus bacteria multiplied rapidly, resembling a bunch of grapes growing in a vineyard.

meanings.definition: Any of various spherical bacteria of the genus Staphylococcus, which includes many pathogenic species.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied different types of staphylococcus under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Staphylococcus can cause various infections in humans.
meanings.sent3: The staphylococcus bacteria threw a party, but some uninvited pathogenic species showed up.
meanings.sent4: The pathogenic staphylococcus bacteria invaded the body like an army of tiny soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The pathogenic staphylococcus bacteria were as dangerous as a pack of wolves hunting in the forest.
